article.title: Welcome to the Nebraska U.S. Export Assistance Center
article.summary: Learn more about the Nebraska U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
​​Are you interested in selling internationally?

The U.S. Commercial Service can help you:

  • Research new international markets
  • Find qualified international buyers and distributors
  • Promote your company at trade events around the world
  • Receive help through every step of the export process

The U.S. Commercial Service is a federal government agency helping companies succeed in exporting. The Omaha office, serving businesses across Nebraska, is part of a global network of trade professionals. Our in-depth industry and tradecraft knowledge coupled with an array of exporting services allows us to specialize in providing customized international business solutions.

Contact us for help with your international trade questions and learn how we can help your company grow internationally.
article.seometadatatitle: Welcome to the Nebraska U.S. Export Assistance Center
article.seometadatadescription: Learn more about the Nebraska U.S. Export Assistance Center.
